Perceptor::

"Are you alway such fool????"said a voice, seconds later, Perceptor 
appeared from a darknest corder"Can't you see the power that he 
has???? we have the best chance to defeat maximal!!!!!! YOu fool!!!"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Lestat Lioncourt <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> 
> Rancor:
>      He jumps from the tree and stands next to Cygnar, "I will join 
you!" Then he goes off in manical laughter.
>  Rudra656@a... wrote:OOC: Finally, I was wondering when they'd come 
back to reality. 
> 
> ::Cygnar:: 
>       He looks warily at the newly formed Hydras.  He slowly comes 
out into the open to stand in front of Hydras.  He looks up at him 
and stares.  "No.  You ask us to give up our weapons and join forces 
with our so called enemy.  I say NO!  I cannot and will not allow you 
to dissolve your own army.  Even if it costs me my life.  I WILL NOT 
SUBMIT!!!"  He backs up a few steps.  "WHO IS WITH ME?  WHO HERE 
BELIEVES IN WHAT THEY WERE FIGHTING FOR?  WHO HERE HAS THE COURAGE TO 
SAY NO?"  He backs up a few more steps and braces himself.
